thread.title: Pence visits Jewish cemetery that was vandalized
thread.title_full: Pence visits Jewish cemetery that was vandalized | Washington Examiner

author: Anna Giaritelli
title: Pence visits Jewish cemetery that was vandalized
text:
Vice President Mike Pence on Wednesday afternoon visited the Chesed Shel Emeth Society, a Jewish cemetery in St. Louis that had been vandalized over the holiday weekend.
"We condemn this vile act of vandalism and those that perpetrate it in the strongest possible terms," Pence, a Christian, said on behalf of the Trump administration.
VP Mike Pence makes stop at Jewish Cemetery in University City. pic.twitter.com/WuIIY5Sf8U â€” FOX2now (@FOX2now) February 22, 2017 
Pence was in the Midwest on Wednesday to meet with officials at the Fabick Cat plant in Missouri.
